text: Five Boys from Barska Street () is a 1954 Polish drama movie directed by Aleksander Ford and based on the 1952 novel of the same name by Kazimierz Koźniewski. It stars Aleksandra Śląska, Tadeusz Janczar, Andrzej Kozak, Tadeusz Łomnicki, Ludwik Benoit. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Aleksander Ford
title: Five Boys from Barska Street
